SEARCH
Package pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1

Class PokerServer

java.lang.Object
pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.PokerServer
public class PokerServer extends Object
Class PokerServer is the main class that provides clients a way to play the poker game.
Author:
Kacper Cienkosz

  • Field Details

    • selector

      private static Selector selector
      Selector takes care for handling non-blocking IO while server communicates with clients.

    • clients

      private static final HashMap<Integer,SocketChannel> clients
      HashMap clients keeps information about currently connected clients. Keys are clients IDs and values are SocketChannels assigned to clients.

    • NUMBER_OF_PLAYERS

      private static final int NUMBER_OF_PLAYERS
      Number of players stands for the number of players that can join the game on the PokerServer. It is a starting parameter of the server and varies from 2 to 4.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • game

      private static final pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.Game game
      Actual game running on the server. Please see Game for information about Game class.

    • nextClientId

      private static int nextClientId
      ID of the next client when they connect to the server.

  • Constructor Details

    • PokerServer

      public PokerServer()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Method main provide all functionality of the PokerServer.
      Parameters:
      args - Arguments passed to the PokerServer while executing.

    • handleAccept

      private static int handleAccept(ServerSocketChannel serverSocketChannel) throws IOException
      Method handleAccept accepts or refuses connections to the PokerServer. If connection was accepted method sends message with action ACCEPT. Sends message with action DENY otherwise. For further information about actions see MessageParser
      Parameters:
      serverSocketChannel - ServerSocketChannel that is responsible for accepting connections.
      Returns:
      Returns ID of the client that has connected. If -1 than it means that connection has not been accepted.
      Throws:
      IOException - Something goes wrong while accepting connection or while receiving or sending message. For further information please see ServerSocketChannel, SocketChannel.

    • handleRead

      private static pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.MessageParser handleRead(SelectionKey key) throws IOException, EmptyMessageException
      Method handleRead parses message received by PokerServer.
      Parameters:
      key - SelectionKey given by Selector.
      Returns:
      Message parsed in MessageParser. For further information please see MessageParser.
      Throws:
      IOException - Something goes wrong while receiving or sending message. For further information please see SocketChannel.
      EmptyMessageException - EmptyMessageException is thrown when message received by the server is empty.

    • handleWrite

      private static void handleWrite(int gameId, int playerId, pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.MessageParser.Action action, String actionParameter)
      Method handleWrite handles sending messages from PokerServers to clients.
      Parameters:
      gameId - ID of the game that message is related to.
      playerId - ID of the player that message is directed to.
      action - Type of action that is sent by server.
      actionParameter - Additional parameters sent with message.

    • waitForConnections

      private static void waitForConnections(ServerSocketChannel serverSocketChannel) throws IOException
      Method is used when awaiting connections after starting server.
      Parameters:
      serverSocketChannel - ServerSocketChannel that is responsible for accepting connections.
      Throws:
      IOException - Something goes wrong while accepting connection or while receiving or sending message. For further information please see ServerSocketChannel, SocketChannel.

    • disconnect

      private static void disconnect(SocketChannel client, pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.MessageParser parser)
      Method handles user disconnecting from the server after receiving or sending DISCONNECT action in message. For further information about actions see MessageParser
      Parameters:
      client - SocketChannel of client that sent the message.
      parser - MessageParser containing message from client.

    • serverDisconnect

      private static void serverDisconnect(int playerId, String message)
      Method handling connection aborted by server.
      Parameters:
      playerId - ID of the player with which connection was broken.
      message - Message to the client explaining why connection was broken.

    • carryOutGame

      private static boolean carryOutGame(ServerSocketChannel serverSocketChannel) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Method carries out one game.
      Parameters:
      serverSocketChannel - ServerSocketChannel that is responsible for accepting connections.
      Returns:
      true if new game should be started, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException - Something goes wrong while accepting connection or while receiving or sending message. For further information please see ServerSocketChannel, SocketChannel.
      InterruptedException - Appears if thread was interrupted while executing TimeUnit.SECONDS.sleep() or TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.sleep().

    • sendPlayersHands

      private static void sendPlayersHands()
      Method handles sending all players their hands by sending message with action HAND. For further information about actions see MessageParser

    • sendPlayersHands

      private static void sendPlayersHands(Integer id)
      Method handles sending hand to one player by sending message with action HAND. For further information about actions see MessageParser
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the player that hand should be sent to.

    • sendPlayerEvaluations

      private static void sendPlayerEvaluations()
      Method handles sending all players evaluations of their hands by sending message with action EVAL. For further information about actions see MessageParser

    • sendPlayerEvaluations

      private static void sendPlayerEvaluations(Integer id)
      Method handles sending one player evaluations of their hands by sending message with action EVAL For further information about actions see MessageParser
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the player that hand evaluation should be sent to.

    • sendBiddingRequest

      private static void sendBiddingRequest(Integer id, HashMap<Integer,Boolean> alreadySentBiddingRequest)
      Method sends bidding request to the player by sending message with action BID. For further information about actions see MessageParser
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the player that request should be sent to.
      alreadySentBiddingRequest - HashMap containing information if bidding request was already sent to players.

    • sendBiddingRequest

      private static void sendBiddingRequest(Integer id)
      Method sends bidding request to the player by sending message with action BID. For further information about actions see MessageParser Method is executed only after denial of the bidding request received by server.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the player that request should be sent to.

    • handleBiddingProcess

      private static void handleBiddingProcess() throws IOException, pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.exceptions.GameEndedByFoldingException
      Method handles all the bidding process.
      Throws:
      IOException - Something goes wrong while receiving or sending message. For further information please see SocketChannel.
      pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.exceptions.GameEndedByFoldingException - See GameEndedByFoldingException

    • handleOneBid

      private static boolean handleOneBid(pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.MessageParser parser)
      Method handles single bid request received from the player.
      Parameters:
      parser - MessageParser containing message from client.
      Returns:
      true when bid was accepted, false otherwise.

    • sendDrawRequest

      private static void sendDrawRequest(Integer id, HashMap<Integer,Boolean> alreadySentDrawRequest)
      Method sends draw request to all the players by sending message with action DRAW. For further information about actions see MessageParser
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the player that request should be sent to.
      alreadySentDrawRequest - HashMap containing information if draw request was already sent to the players.

    • sendDrawRequest

      private static void sendDrawRequest(Integer id)
      Method sends draw request to one player by sending message with action DRAW. For further information about actions see MessageParser
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the player that request should be sent to.

    • handleDraw

      private static void handleDraw(pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.MessageParser parser) throws pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.exceptions.NoSuchCardException, pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.exceptions.IncorrectNumberOfCardsException
      Method handles DRAW request received from the player. For further information about actions see MessageParser
      Parameters:
      parser - MessageParser containing message from client.
      Throws:
      pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.exceptions.NoSuchCardException - See NoSuchCardException
      pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.exceptions.IncorrectNumberOfCardsException - See IncorrectNumberOfCardsException

    • handleDrawingProcess

      private static void handleDrawingProcess() throws IOException
      Method handles all the drawing process.
      Throws:
      IOException - Something went wrong while receiving or sending message. For further information please see SocketChannel.

    • handleFold

      private static void handleFold(Integer id) throws pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.exceptions.GameEndedByFoldingException
      Method handles FOLD request from the player. For further information about actions see MessageParser
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the player that request should be sent to.
      Throws:
      pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.exceptions.GameEndedByFoldingException - See GameEndedByFoldingException

    • sendPlayerCredit

      private static void sendPlayerCredit(int playerId)
      Methods sends player their credit by sending message with action CREDIT. ID of the player that request should be sent to.
      Parameters:
      playerId - ID of the player that request should be sent to.

    • handlePrizingProcess

      private static void handlePrizingProcess()
      Method handles player prizing after the game have finished

    • handleEndgameProcess

      private static boolean handleEndgameProcess(ServerSocketChannel serverSocketChannel) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Method handles all the endgame process (also waiting for new players).
      Parameters:
      serverSocketChannel - ServerSocketChannel that is responsible for accepting connections.
      Returns:
      true if new game should be started, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException - Something goes wrong while accepting connection or while receiving or sending message. For further information please see ServerSocketChannel, SocketChannel.
      InterruptedException - Appears if thread was interrupted while executing TimeUnit.SECONDS.sleep() or TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.sleep().

    • sendEnd

      private static void sendEnd(int playersMissing, HashMap<Integer,Boolean> acceptedLastRequest)
      Sends players information about game end by sending message with action END and information about how many players are missing.
      Parameters:
      playersMissing - Number of players needed to start new game.
      acceptedLastRequest - HashMap containing information if players accepted last end request.

    • handleReadableKeyInWaitingForConnections

      private static void handleReadableKeyInWaitingForConnections(SelectionKey key) throws IOException
      Method handles readable keys in waiting for connections.
      Parameters:
      key - SelectionKey given by Selector.
      Throws:
      IOException - Something goes wrong while receiving or sending message. For further information please see SocketChannel.

    • nextBidder

      private static int nextBidder(int bidderIndex, ArrayList<Integer> biddingOrder, HashMap<Integer,Boolean> alreadySentBiddingRequest)
      Method returns next bidder index.
      Parameters:
      bidderIndex - Current bidder index in biddingOrder.
      biddingOrder - ArrayList containing biddingOrder. See Game.getBiddingOrder().
      alreadySentBiddingRequest - HashMap containing information if bidding request was already sent to players. If bidding round has ended all the values are set to false.
      Returns:
      Next bidder id.

    • handleKeyInBiddingProcess

      private static int handleKeyInBiddingProcess(SelectionKey key, int bidderIndex, ArrayList<Integer> biddingOrder, HashMap<Integer,Boolean> sentBiddingRequest) throws pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.exceptions.GameEndedByFoldingException, IOException
      Method handles readable keys in bidding process.
      Parameters:
      key - SelectionKey given by Selector.
      bidderIndex - Current bidder index.
      biddingOrder - ArrayList containing biddingOrder. See Game.getBiddingOrder().
      sentBiddingRequest - HashMap containing information if bidding request was already sent to players. If bidding round has ended all the values are set to false.
      Returns:
      Next bidder index.
      Throws:
      pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.exceptions.GameEndedByFoldingException - See GameEndedByFoldingException
      IOException - Something goes wrong while receiving or sending message. For further information please see SocketChannel.

    • handleDrawRequest

      private static int handleDrawRequest(pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.MessageParser parser, int drawerIndex)
      Handles draw request received by server.
      Parameters:
      parser - MessageParser containing message from client.
      drawerIndex - Index of current drawer.
      Returns:
      Index of next drawer.

    • readableKeyInEndgameProcess

      private static int readableKeyInEndgameProcess(SelectionKey key, int playersMissing, Set<Integer> playersWantToPlay, HashMap<Integer,Boolean> acceptedLastRequest) throws IOException
      Method handles readable key in endgame process. Changes missingPlayers and playersWantToPlay.
      Parameters:
      key - SelectionKey given by Selector
      playersMissing - Number of players needed to start new game.
      playersWantToPlay - ArrayList containing indices of players that declared will to play next game.
      acceptedLastRequest - HashMap containing information if players accepted last end request.
      Returns:
      Number of still missing players.
      Throws:
      IOException - Something goes wrong while receiving or sending message. For further information please see SocketChannel.

    • acceptableKeyInEndgameProcess

      private static int acceptableKeyInEndgameProcess(ServerSocketChannel serverSocketChannel, int playersMissing, Set<Integer> playersWantToPlay, HashMap<Integer,Boolean> acceptedLastRequest) throws IOException
      Method handles acceptable keys in endgame process. Changes missingPlayers and playersWantToPlay. Accepts new players.
      Parameters:
      serverSocketChannel - ServerSocketChannel that is responsible for accepting connections.
      playersMissing - Number of players needed to start new game.
      playersWantToPlay - ArrayList containing indices of players that declared will to play next game.
      acceptedLastRequest - HashMap containing information if players accepted last end request.
      Returns:
      New number of players needed to start new game.
      Throws:
      IOException - Something goes wrong while accepting connection or while receiving or sending message. For further information please see ServerSocketChannel, SocketChannel.
